about: "Add full CRUD for students and an SQL import script"
title: "Add Student CRUD and provide SQL import"
labels: backend,database

# Student CRUD & SQL import

- Implement endpoints for create/read/update/delete students.
- Provide an SQL import/migration script using `student.sql`.
- Add tests for core CRUD operations.

Acceptance criteria:
- Student CRUD works end-to-end.
- Import script loads sample data into DB.
